Title: Just Visiting
Writer: Jean-Marie Poiré, Christian Clavier, Christian Clavier (screenplay), Jean-Marie Poiré (screenplay), John Hughes (screenplay)
Actors: Jean Reno, Christina Applegate, Christian Clavier, Matt Ross
Plot: A French count is in England to marry the princess. She's killed. A wizard helps him to time travel back before the murder - except they end up in Chicago, April 2000. A descendant helps him. He looks for the wizard to return to the 1100s.
